column3: Language name (in native language).  This means the NAME OF THE LANGUAGE BEING TRANSLATED INTO, and should NOT be a translation of the word 'English'.
Mod description, visibile in content manager.

column2:
Shift: increase speed (x10)
Alt: decrease speed (/ 10)
Ctrl: decrease speed significantly (/ 100)
Don't change camera rotation when following vehicles or citizens
When this is selected camera zooming will be offset towards the mouse cursor (instead of aligned to the middle of the screen)
Resets the assigned keys to default settings, using current game settings where applicable.

column3: Options panel tab: configure generic action hotkeys.
Options panel item: set the hotkey to reset the camera rotation.

column2: Resets the camera rotation to 90 degrees and facing straight down
Moves the camera to point at the middle of the current Move It selection (if any)

Press this and Control to rotate the camera to the next 15 degree increment.
Use Control+Alt to change the increment to 45 degrees.
Use Shift as well to rotate in the opposite direction.
These mods must be removed before ACME can operate.
